029        private static final String FENSED_BLOCK_START_PREFIX_REGEX = "(^|((\\R|^)(\\s)*\\R))"; //String start or an empty line before   "\\R(\\s)*\\R"; 
030        private static final String FENCED_BLOCK_START_SUFFIX_REGEX = "(\\s)*\\R"; // Zero or more whitespace followed by a new line.

112                return "fenced_block_token_"+UUID.randomUUID().toString().replace("-", "_");
113        }

119        /**
120         * @param markdown Markdown to pre-process
121         * @param replacements Accumulator of post-processing replacements token -&gt; HTML to replace the token with.
122         * @return
123         */
124        protected String preProcessMarkdown(String markdown, Map<String,String> replacements) {
125                if (isProcessFendedBlocks()) {
126                        String ret = processFencedBlocks(markdown, DiagramGenerator.UML_DIALECT, START_UML_PATTERN, replacements, false);
127                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.SALT_DIALECT, START_WIREFRAME_PATTERN, replacements, false);
128                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.GANTT_DIALECT, START_GANTT_PATTERN, replacements, false);
129                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.MINDMAP_DIALECT, START_MINDMAP_PATTERN, replacements, false);
130                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.WBS_DIALECT, START_WBS_PATTERN, replacements, false);
131                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.DRAWIO_DIALECT, START_DRAWIO_PATTERN, replacements, false);
132                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.MERMAID_DIALECT, START_MERMAID_PATTERN, replacements, false);
133                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, null, START_PNG_PATTERN, replacements, false);
134                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, null, START_JPEG_PATTERN, replacements, false);
135                                        
136                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.UML_DIALECT, START_UML_RESOURCE_PATTERN, replacements, true);
137                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.SALT_DIALECT, START_WIREFRAME_RESOURCE_PATTERN, replacements, true);
138                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.GANTT_DIALECT, START_GANTT_RESOURCE_PATTERN, replacements, true);
139                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.MINDMAP_DIALECT, START_MINDMAP_RESOURCE_PATTERN, replacements, true);
140                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.WBS_DIALECT, START_WBS_RESOURCE_PATTERN, replacements, true);
141                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.DRAWIO_DIALECT, START_DRAWIO_RESOURCE_PATTERN, replacements, true);
142                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, DiagramGenerator.MERMAID_DIALECT, START_MERMAID_RESOURCE_PATTERN, replacements, true);
143                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, null, START_PNG_RESOURCE_PATTERN, replacements, true);
144                        ret = processFencedBlocks(ret, null, START_JPEG_RESOURCE_PATTERN, replacements, true);
145                                        
146                        return ret;             
147                }
148                                
149                return markdown;
150        }
151
152        /**
153         * 
154         * @param input
155         * @param dialect
156         * @param startPattern
157         * @param replacements
158         * @param resource Indicates that spec is a URL of a resource resolved relative to the URL returned by getResourceBase(). The URL supports <code>classpath</code> schema for classloader resources.
159         * @return
160         */
161        private String processFencedBlocks(String input, String dialect, Pattern startPattern, Map<String,String> replacements, boolean resource) {
162                StringBuilder output = new StringBuilder();
163                Matcher startMatcher = startPattern.matcher(input);
164                int i = 0;
165                while (startMatcher.find()) {
166                    int startMatcherStart = startMatcher.start();
167                    if (startMatcherStart >= i) { // Need to reproduce a situation when i is greater than startMatcherStart
168                                int startMatcherEnd = startMatcher.end();
169                                String endMatcherContent = input.substring(startMatcherEnd);
170                                Matcher endMatcher = FENCED_BLOCK_PATTERN.matcher(endMatcherContent);                   
171                                if (endMatcher.find()) {
172                                        if (startMatcherStart > i) {
173                                                output.append(input.substring(i, startMatcherStart));
174                                        }
175                                        String bareSpec = processSpec(dialect, endMatcherContent.substring(0, endMatcher.start())) ;
176                                        String match = endMatcherContent.substring(endMatcher.start(), endMatcher.end());
177                                    i = startMatcherEnd + endMatcher.start() + match.indexOf("```") + 3; // Just the closing back-ticks, no space or new line characters.
178                                        
179                                        if (resource) {                                 
180                                                try {           
181                                                        URI resourceURI = URI.createURI(bareSpec);
182                                                        URI resourceBase = getResourceBase();
183                                                        if (resourceBase != null && !resourceBase.isRelative() && resourceBase.isHierarchical()) {
184                                                                resourceURI = resourceURI.resolve(resourceBase);
185                                                        }
186                                                        bareSpec = loadResource(resourceURI, dialect == null);
187                                                } catch (Exception e) {                                 
188                                                        output
189                                                                .append(System.lineSeparator())
190                                                                .append("<div class=\"nsd-error\">").append(System.lineSeparator())
191                                                                .append("Error loading resource " + bareSpec + ": " + e) 
192                                                                .append(System.lineSeparator()).append("</div>")
193                                                                .append(System.lineSeparator());
194                                                        bareSpec = null;
195                                                }
196                                        }
197                                        
198                                        if (bareSpec != null) {
199                                                String escapedBareSpec = escapeDiagramSpec(dialect, bareSpec);
200                                                
201                                                StringBuilder replacementBuilder = new StringBuilder();
202                                                if (!Util.isBlank(escapedBareSpec)) {
203                                                        replacementBuilder
204                                                                .append(System.lineSeparator())
205                                                                .append("<div style='display:none;white-space:pre-wrap' title='Diagram escaped spec for search'>").append(System.lineSeparator())
206                                                                .append(escapedBareSpec).append(System.lineSeparator()) 
207                                                                .append("</div> ").append(System.lineSeparator());
208                                                }
209                                                
210                                                try {
211                                                        String token = nextToken();
212                                                        
213                                                        if (dialect == null) {
214                                                                replacementBuilder.append("<img src=\"data:image/");
215                                                                if (startPattern == START_PNG_PATTERN || startPattern == START_PNG_RESOURCE_PATTERN) {
216                                                                        replacementBuilder.append("png");
217                                                                } else if (startPattern == START_JPEG_PATTERN || startPattern == START_JPEG_RESOURCE_PATTERN) {
218                                                                        replacementBuilder.append("jpeg");
219                                                                }
220                                                                replacementBuilder
221                                                                        .append(";base64, ")
222                                                                        .append(bareSpec)
223                                                                        .append("\"/>")
224                                                                        .append(System.lineSeparator());
225                                                        } else {
226                                                                replacementBuilder
227                                                                        .append(getDiagramGenerator().generateDiagram(bareSpec, dialect))
228                                                                        .append(System.lineSeparator());
229                                                        }
230                                                        
231                                                        replacements.put(token, replacementBuilder.toString());
232                                                        output
233                                                                .append(System.lineSeparator())
234                                                                .append(System.lineSeparator())
235                                                                .append(token)
236                                                                .append(System.lineSeparator())
237                                                                .append(System.lineSeparator());
238                                                } catch (Exception e) {
239                                                        output.append("<div class=\"nsd-error\">Error during diagram rendering: " + e + "</div>");
240                                                }
241                                        }                               
242                                }
243                    }
244                }
245                output.append(input.substring(i, input.length()));
246                return output.toString();
247        }
248        
249        /**
250         * Override to process bare spec.
251         * @param dialect
252         * @param bareSpec
253         * @return
254         */
255        protected String processSpec(String dialect, String bareSpec) {
256                return bareSpec;
257        }
258
259        protected String escapeDiagramSpec(String dialect, String bareSpec) {
260                if (dialect == null) {
261                        return null; // For PNG and JPEG
262                }
263                if (DiagramGenerator.DRAWIO_DIALECT.equals(dialect)) {
264                        // TODO - Extract text from XML, return null for now.
265                        // Not needed with Nasdanika search - it extracts text from Drawio diagrams.
266                        return null;
267                }
268                if (DiagramGenerator.MERMAID_DIALECT.equals(dialect)) {
269                        // No need - spec is available as plain text. 
270                        return null;
271                }
272                return StringEscapeUtils.escapeHtml4(bareSpec).trim();
273        }
274        
275        protected ClassLoader getResourceClassLoader() {
276                return getClass().getClassLoader();
277        }
278        
279        /**
280         * Loads resource and optionally encodes it to Base64.
281         * @param resource
282         * @param encode
283         * @return
284         */
285        protected String loadResource(URI resource, boolean encode) throws Exception {
286                if (encode) {
287                        byte[] bytes = DefaultConverter.INSTANCE.toByteArray(resource);
288                        return Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(bytes);
289                }
290                return DefaultConverter.INSTANCE.stringContent(resource);
291        }

293        /**
294         * Override to return base URL for resolving resource references in UML resource blocks.
295         * @return
296         */
297        protected URI getResourceBase() {
298                return null;
299        }

301        protected boolean isProcessFendedBlocks() {
302                return true;
303        }
304                
305        protected DataHolder getFlexmarkOptions() {
306            return PegdownOptionsAdapter.flexmarkOptions(
307                        Extensions.FOOTNOTES 
308                        | Extensions.SUBSCRIPT 
309                        | Extensions.STRIKETHROUGH 
310                        | Extensions.SUPERSCRIPT 
311                        | Extensions.TOC 
312                        | (Extensions.ALL ^ Extensions.HARDWRAPS ^ Extensions.SUPPRESS_HTML_BLOCKS ^ Extensions.SUPPRESS_INLINE_HTML ^ Extensions.SUPPRESS_ALL_HTML));
313        }       
314        
315        protected Parser createMarkdownParser() {
316                return Parser.builder(getFlexmarkOptions()).build();
317        }
318                
319        protected HtmlRenderer createMarkdownHtmlRenderer() {
320                return HtmlRenderer.builder(getFlexmarkOptions()).build();
321        }
322                        
323        public String markdownToHtml(String markdown) {
324                if (Util.isBlank(markdown)) {
325                        return "";
326                }
327                Map<String,String> replacements = new HashMap<>();
328                Document document = createMarkdownParser().parse(preProcessMarkdown(markdown, replacements));
329                String html = createMarkdownHtmlRenderer().render(document);
330                for (Entry<String, String> te: replacements.entrySet()) {
331                        html = html.replace(te.getKey(), te.getValue());
332                }
333                return html;
334        }
335        
336        /**
337         * Converts markdown to HTML, converts HTML to plain text and then extracts the first sentence.
338         * @param markdown
339         * @return
340         */
341        public String firstPlainTextSentence(String markdown) {
342                return firstSentence(Jsoup.parse(markdownToHtml(markdown)).text());             
343        }
344        
345        /**
346         * Extracts first sentence from text
347         * @param context
348         * @param text
349         * @return
350         * @throws Exception
351         */
352        public String firstSentence(String text) {
353                return Util.firstSentence(text, getMinFirstSentenceLength(), getMaxFirstSentenceLength(), getAbbreviations());
354        }
355        
356        protected int getMinFirstSentenceLength() {
357                return MIN_FIRST_SENTENCE_LENGTH;
358        }
359        
360        protected int getMaxFirstSentenceLength() {
361                return MAX_FIRST_SENTENCE_LENGTH;
362        }
